page.title: 18Ecology,Sherburn-in-Elmet.
page.content: The Willows is quiet.The only thing which spoils it is the farmer who is destroying the nature in the reserve. He is cutting down trees,pulling up the flowers and polluting the stream. Certain flowers like the spotted orchid and the bee orchid are very rare.A long time ago there would have been many orchids, now there are hardly any left.If the trees,flowers and grasses are all uprooted the wild life will disappear,because the surroundings are the creatures' habitat.People dump rubbish and the animals could be trapped or suffocated Some farmers are cutting the trees down so they can take more land to make more money.I think it is a good idea to have The Willows because we can learn a lot about nature by visiting this conservation area.
